title: The Zwift Hub Smart Trainer Has Been Discontinued… And Replaced by the Wahoo Kickr Core Bundle
content:
The new Wahoo Kickr Core Bundle includes a year of Zwift and a choice of preinstalled cassettes. Which trainer is best for you? We dig into it.

Read the full article at The Zwift Hub Smart Trainer Has Been Discontinued… And Replaced by the Wahoo Kickr Core Bundle on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
